sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal here-ditary disease.
sentences.cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命遗传疾病。

sentences.en: Her children's death is a fatal blow on her.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的死对她是致命的打击.

sentences.en: I made the fatal mistake of letting her talk.
sentences.cn: 我让她讲话是犯了严重的错误.

sentences.en: If it is not treated correctly, the condition can prove fatal (= be fatal ) .
sentences.cn: 如果治疗不当，这种病可能会致命。

sentences.en: In 1742 he suffered a fatal attack of smallpox.
It is impossible to say who struck the fatal blow.
sentences.cn: 很难判断是谁给了致命的一击。

sentences.en: It would be fatal to bring in outsider.
sentences.cn: 把外人引进来可能招致灾难.

sentences.en: One moment of inattention when driving could be fatal.
sentences.cn: 开车时稍一疏忽就可能出人命.

sentences.en: Statistically, ninety-eight percent of all acute sunstroke cases are fatal.
sentences.cn: 据统计，急性中暑病例中有98%是致命的。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: The bite of a mad dog is fatal.
The enemy got a fatal blow in the battle.
sentences.cn: 敌人在战斗中受到致命的打击.

sentences.en: This fatal miscalculation lost them the final victory.
sentences.cn: 这个致命的错误估计使他们未能夺得最后胜利.

sentences.en: Two of the knife thrusts were fatal.

words.tran_cn: 命中注定的，宿命的；受命运支配的
重大的；决定性的；宿命的
致命地；命中注定地；不可避免地
死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸

phrases.tran_cn: 致命的吸引力（电影名称）；致命的诱惑（电影名称）
致命错误，不可恢复的错误

trans.tran_cn: 致命的，灾难性的，后果极严重的
